task.title: Saftey Instruction
task.shortdesc: Like with all cooking, there are potential hazzards

taskbody.context:
This set of saftey tips will make sure there are no unwanted injuries
Saftey Steps

step.cmd: Avoid touching the surface of heated elements, such as stove tops, boiling water, hot pans and more
Cut and peel away from your body, all motions should move outwards away from any part of your body
only use fresh ingredients, avoid using expired, or unwashed foods
clean all utensils before using them
